src_original: dvidhā bhavati cyutiḥsamucchedikā ca acityapariṇāminī ceti /

anayostāvaccyutyoravidyāvāsabhūmipratyayairanāstravakarmahetubhiḥ samudbhūtā jātistu bhavatyeveti nirdiṣṭam / tathā hi -  “bhagavan, yaduta upādānapratyayāḥ sāstravakarmahetukāstrayo bhavāḥ sambhavanti /
tgt_original: 如契經說，如取為緣，有漏業因續後有者，而生三有。
